main.name: Don Dean
main.occupation: Front End Developer with Full Stack Training
main.description: A passionately creative developer who strives to bring success in every endevor
main.bio: I Am a professional web developer from Denver, CO.  With experience in Sales, Design and Business my ability to see big picture and compartmentalize to make a working plan is second to none.         As a father of 2 young children my main focus is to provide stability and happiness which means a need to Love my job and be able to happy at home which is why at 33 I decided to change careers into something more creative and not completely encompassing while still being challenged and feeling accomplished.        A lover of music and art as well as being a musician in 2 bands its my life goal to be passionately creative in whatever Iâ€™m doing be it work or home or in my art. I strive to bring success to whatever I do and accomplish goals to the very best of my ability.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me with questions.

resume.skillmessage: Having owned my own business I have the abillity to manage people, teams and myself. I have experience dealing with customers and day to day business activities.  Im also very creative and passionate about getting things done right and in a timely manner.

education.description: Full coding immersion experience where I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS and other JS tools such as JSNode, npm, Axios, Express, SQL, MongoDB, PWAs and more.
Skills in Business, Management and Marketing.
